body:
♦Well, I finally made my outro after 2 and half hours of hard work♦. ♠Blood, Tears and Sweat was used for this♠. ♣All of the content was made by me except for the minecraft mud texture♣. ◘Hopefully you would like this Outro◘. ◙If you see any faults or anything to improve, please just tell me below so I can improve◙!
Here is the Link - ▲https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i8_pLOW01TI▲
These are the programs and mods I used
▲Cinema 4D for 3D Models
▲Photoshop for Title, Square for Previous Video and the Overlay
▲Overlays used from Youtube
▲Camera Studio Mod for Cinematic Video
▲Vegas for Editing
▲Shaders Mod
▲Thanks to April and Gameslasher13 for some tips to improve

title: ▲My Outro, Any Tips? ▲(←Click it now!)

replies.body:
Pretty cool! I really liked how you had Minecraft footage in the background, I also liked how you have a previous video box and how you put your Minecraft characters at the side.
GOOD JOB Ingigo!!!!
